transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan Naveen ji. Ji Rajesh ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan haan main hi baat kar raha hun. Main.
Customer: Bataiye bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Abhi main free hun aur 10 minute ka time denge to main online bhi aa jaunga system pe.
Executive: Haan bataiye kya issue hai sir pehle baat kar lete hain. Haan bataiye abhi kya aa raha hai kyunki hum pehle bhi baat ki hai sir aapko yaad hoga.
Customer: Sir dekhiye sabse bada issue abhi tak mera aap kuch sort nahi kar paye. Jitni baar aap phone kare main ek hi issue ko leke baitha hun kal hi. Mere paas query aayi. Usme likha tha Lucknow. Customer ko maine phone kiya wo baitha hai Hyderabad mein. Kaise?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Abhi kahiye aapko conference pe le lu main usko. Agar kahiye abhi conference pe le lu.
Executive: Nahi nahi conference mat lijiye pehle aap mujhe bata dijiye kya kya issue aa raha hai to main uska solution aapko dunga.
Customer: Haan dekhiye ekdam genuine solution dijiyega mujhe chutiya banane ki koshish mat kariyega. Main pagal nahi hun. Mujhe ekdam bilkul genuine reason dijiyega.
Executive: Rajesh ji thoda sa professional aapko hona padega.
Customer: Haan main haan haan sir main main wahi bol raha hun na genuine reason.
Executive: Thoda professional hi baat kariye sir please. 
Customer: Main main wahi baat kar raha hun. Main ekdam genuine reason pe mujhse baat kariyega aisi kahani mat patti padhaiyega jo scripted lage. Kyunki main phir professionalism chhod dunga utni der ek second ke andar. Kyunki aisa nahi ki aaj main pehli baar IndiaMART. Dekhiye main phir keh raha hun aapse jo reason hoga wo ekdam genuine hoga scripted answer denge to main professionalism kinare kar dunga do minute mein.
Executive: Theek hai kyunki jo aap mujhe reply de rahe hain.
Executive: Main aapko ek baat clear kar deta hun sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main aapko ek cheez clear kar deta hun agar aap professionally baat karenge to hi main aapse baat kar paunga aap ye bol rahe ho sir ki main scripted cheeze bataunga.
Customer: Haan scripted mat bataiyega abhi main pehle pehle pehle ek minute ek minute aap meri baat suniye sir ek minute. Abhi ek minute rukiye ab main ab main ab main isi pe aa jata hun saare issues kinare karo pehle. Pehle to mujhe us pagal aadmi se milwaiye jisne kitchen ko cushion likha hua hai. Wo kaun insaan hai sir pagal likha hai.
Executive: Abhi online nahi aa payenge na?
Customer: Abhi online nahi aa payenge 10 minute lagenge online aane mein. Abhi to main bas pahunch raha hun office apne raaste mein hun. Haan. Aap online pehle aa jaiye to saamne baat kar lete hain sir. Wo kaun sa aisa mahapurush hai jisne saare kitchen mein mere mein ek hi photo laga rakhi hai. Mujhe pehle usse baat karaiye aap. Wo kaun sa aisa bahut bada vidwan wo vidwan hai jisko itna bhi nahi pata hai ki jisme matlab agar specification mein door ka photo laga hoga to usne kuch aur laga rakha hua hai. Wo kaun hai aisa vidwan aapke yahan jara baat karaiye meri usse. Kahi wo aap to nahi hai ki main aap hi ki intzaar kiye ja raha hun utni der se. Ye bataiye pehle.
Executive: Sir ye jab aapki service live hui thi na to us pe ye kaam hua tha wo add kiya gaya tha aur option aapko aata hai usko edit karne ka.
Customer: Wo add kiya gaya wo add kiya gaya tha edit kiya gaya tha wo mere hand mein nahi tha. Maine isme shuru se leke aakhri tak kaha. Phir option yaar option koi bhi aata ho mujhe isse nahi matlab hai maine aapko paise diye mera kaam achcha hona chahiye baat khatam. Main apne haath se apne server pe koi kaam nahi karunga. Ye sab kaam aapka hai. Mera kaam nahi hai.
Executive: Sir ek cheez samjho sir aap apne product ko jyada jante ho bakiyon se aapne bola ki ye cheeze galat add hui hai to wo aap hi cheez sahi kar sakte ho sir. Aap ye agar bol rahe ho ki wo product wahan se add hai.
Customer: Dekho dekho dekho dekho dekho suno jyada doodh peete bachche na bano. Aaj ki duniya mein internet available hai chat GPT available hai AI available hai. Har aadmi ko jab koi cheez nahi pata hoti hai to wo usme ja kar ke research kar sakta hai hum bhi koi pet se seekh ke nahi aaye the humne bhi yahi seekha hai aur aap bhi yahi seekhe ho. Theek hai to itna itna apne aap ko bhola bhola na bano agar koi cheez man lijiye nahi seekhne aap haan. Samjh dekhiye pehli cheez sir hum kahi se bhi na copy paste nahi kar sakte sir aap google pe ja kar.
Customer: Copy paste ki baat hi nahi hai mujhe sirf itna batao. Itna batao mujhe khud mein ye tameez hoti hai ki jab upar word kuch alag likha hua hai wahi photo 40 jagah lagane ki kya jarurat thi nahi thi tumhare paas mat lagate tameez to ye hoti hai na. Ki ye bhi tameez kha gaye ho.
Executive: Sir aapka catalog live hone se pehle aapse approval lekar uske baad live kiya gaya hai sir.
Customer: Approval approval is baat ka nahi liya gaya tha ki hum ek hi photo 50 jagah lagayenge. Approval is baat ka nahi liya gaya tha. Chalo achcha is baat ko pura chhodo catalog chhodo catalog ki baat to hum baad mein karenge hum pehle buylead ki baat ki yahan se yahan se hamara business develop ho raha hai generate ho raha hai. Hume khali itna batao ki agar kisi customer ki query aayi us pe likha hua hai Lucknow humne usko phone kiya wo Hyderabad ka kaise nikla keh raha hum Hyderabad mein baithe hain sir Lucknow ka to kaam hi nahi hai ab hum ye batao khali.
Executive: Sir Lucknow mein dekhiye agar wo requirement dal raha hai Lucknow ki sir may be ho sakta hai uske distributor wahan pe ho sir ya unke wahan pe requirement post kiya ho unke knowledge mein koi hoga sir to unhone kiya hoga post aisa nahi hai sir ki main Delhi mein baitha hun.
Customer: Phir wahi baat hai phir wahi phir wahi baat aadmi ko aadmi ko ek chhota sa kaam karana hai theek hai to wo Lucknow wo Hyderabad mein baitha hua Lucknow kyun search karega? Ye batao abhi aapko zomato se khana mangana hai.
Executive: Wo nahi karega sir aadmi ek minute bataiye.
Customer: Hume hme ek baat batao tumhe zomato se khana mangana hai to tum Delhi mein baithe ho to kya Pune se mangao ge khana?
Executive: Zomato to alag ho gayi na sir.
Executive: Agar mujhe medical instrument chahiye koi theek hai aur mujhe prayagraj mein to yahan se baith ke main order nahi kar sakta hun prayagraj ke liye?
Customer: To wo kya lekin ye bhi to baat sahi hai na ki wo Lucknow phir wahi baat wo baitha hua hai Hyderabad mein kaam usko Hyderabad mein karana hai.
Executive: Main main kahi pe bhi baitha hun sir main chahun to main Allahabad mein agar mujhe requirement hai wahan pe main bhej nahi sakta hun.
Customer: Agar wo customer kahe wo customer kahe ki nahi humne to Hyderabad ke liye hi dhunda tha Lucknow galat chala gaya sir.
Executive: Sir wahi main keh raha hun sir dekhiye har ek buyer ka intention judge karna wo aapke liye bhi tough hai hamare liye bhi hai sir. Wo aisa nahi hai sir ki har buyer jo hota hai jo requirement wo post kar raha hota hai sir uske confirmation mein hum use verify karte hain uske baad wo post karte hain aisa nahi hai sir ki koi bhi requirement dekh raha ho aur unhone post kar diya hai.
Customer: Sahi hota hi hai koi confirmation nahi karte koi verification nahi hai jaisa paate leta post karke post kar dete ho. Tumhare site se koi system nahi hai tumhare site se koi verification hai hi nahi. Tum log khali bas bilkul free fund ka jo hai utha rahe ho chep rahe ho utha rahe ho chep rahe ho. Ek nahi main tumko teen char logon se baat kara sakta hun jisme tumko yahi milega sir humne to kiya hi nahi hamare mein to aisa tha hi nahi. Are main abhi ek buylead post karu aur mere mein location agar Lucknow ki hui to Lucknow hi dikhayega na. Tum logon ko isse koi matlab hi nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main aapko ek cheez clear karna chahun na agar main yahan baitha hun na Delhi mein sir buylead main post karna chahun to main Allahabad ke liye bhi kar sakta hun aisa mana nahi hai wahan pe ki hum bahar baithe hain kahi aur to hum kahi aur ke liye nahi post kar sakte. Agar mere requirement hai aisa main yahi keh raha hun agar phir wahi baat Lucknow baitha wo Hyderabad mein hai kaam usko Lucknow karayega.
Customer: Sir ye to ye to buyer ke upar depend karta hai na Rajesh sir wo to buyer ka intention hai buyer ka koi screening nahi hai na yahan pe bhai mere buyer ka koi screening nahi hai yahan pe. Buyer ka sirf ek minute IndiaMART ek minute ruk jaiye chup rahiye thoda sa.
Executive: Ji.
(silence)
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Issue with buyleads showing incorrect locations.

- Dissatisfaction with catalog image quality and relevance.

- Frustration with perceived lack of verification process.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the catalog approval process.

- Executive clarified buylead location posting options.

- Executive put the call on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, location, verification, professionalism
